metadata.title: Friday, 5th November, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) how much money was collected, countrywide, as toll fees, from 2016 to August, 2021, year by year;
(b) which toll plaza collected the highest amount;
(c) how many toll plazas were under construction, countrywide, as of August, 2021; and
(d) when the construction will be completed and the plazas become operational.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a correctional facility in Chienge District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Kabwe - Mukonchi road in Kabwe District; and
(b) if so, when the plan will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) when the construction of water reservoirs in Chienge District will commence;
(b) how many reservoirs are earmarked for construction;
(c) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is;
(d) what the cost of the project is;
(e) what the time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(f) when piped water will be provided to the residential areas around the district headquarters.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the construction of Lunga Mini-Hospital in Kasempa District has stalled for over 10 years;
(b) when the construction works will resume;
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the outstanding works is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct additional secondary schools in the following Wards in Chienge Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Lunchinda; (ii) Chibamba; (iii) Chipungu; (iv) Lua;
(v) Chienge; (vi) Ifuna; and (vii) Chipamba;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29th October) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Miyutu, MP) ___________________________
